# Bolts, Crossbow
## Overview
A crossbow bolt used as a melee weapon is treated as a light improvised weapon (–4 penalty on attack rolls) and deals damage as a [[Dagger|dagger]] of its size (crit ×2). Bolts come in a case or quiver that holds 10 bolts (or 5, for a repeating crossbow). 


-tx-
| **Simple Weapon** ||||||||||
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| | **Ranged Weapon** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range Increment** | **Weight** | **Type** |  |
| | Bolts, crossbow (10) | 1 gp | — | — | — | — | 1 lb. | — |  |

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 145
